metadata.synopsis: Orthon and Displacer fight between each other.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Once the ambush has been peacefully resolved, interact with the meat at -646; -5; -722 and discover that it has been poisoned. Then speak with the displacer using Speak with Animals and convince it to fight with you. Once she agrees attack the Orthon and make it so it joins you in combat.

0.speaker: Yurgir
0.context: NodeContext: Surprised/somewhat distraught as his displacer beast companion turns on him mid-combat
